snippet.title: Top Influencer Posts This Week: Why Steve Jobs Hated Poaching, The End of Colleges, and More
snippet.description:
* Chip Cutter
Top Influencer Posts This Week: Why Steve Jobs Hated Poaching, The End of Colleges, and More Chip Cutter January 26, 2013
See Steve Jobs at his most prickly, learn why Mark Cuban thinks colleges may soon go out of business and dig into gourmet doughnuts in this week’s list of the top Influencer posts. How Great Leaders Communicate (George Anders) If you’re a top executive, don’t worry about delivering “brilliant speeches and heroic exhortations.” Those are nice, of course. But the best leaders, George Anders writes, tell stories, read the room and boost morale by…
